title: Charlie : Charlie
description: Ralph Stewart, current CEO of Biomask, Inc., is stepping down from his position to be with his wife who is dying of lung cancer. Biomask is now in search of a new CEO to take his place.Charlie Grainger, CFO of Biomask, Inc., has lived life void of any serious relationship. Playing the field and sewing his wild oats, Charlie has suddenly been put to the test when Charlie Winters enters Biomask, Inc., as their new CEO. Ms. Winters currently owns her own chain of exclusive clubs but since they are pretty much running on their own, Ms. Winters decided to get back out into the workforce to keep busy. Hence, her new position at Biomask, Inc. Ms. Winters is also fighting her own feelings against Mr. Grainger. However, will their relationship be able to withstand the secret that Charlie Winters is withholding from him?
author: L. Sommers
